variantrule.name: I Cercatori delle Chiavi
entries: Un'organizzazione clandestina dedita alla ricerca di antiche chiavi arcane.

entries.name: Obiettivi
entries: Recuperare tutte le chiavi sparse nel continente.
Impedire che cadano in mani sbagliate.

entries.name: Gerarchia
entries: Custode Supremo
Araldi delle Serrature
Iniziati

trait.name: Aura of Protection
entries: Ser Sydwen and friendly creatures within 10 feet gain a +4 bonus to all saving throws.

trait.name: Aura of Devotion
entries: Ser Sydwen and friendly creatures within 10 feet can't be charmed.

trait.name: Divine Smite
entries: When Ser Sydwen hits with a melee weapon attack, she can expend a spell slot to deal radiant damage: 2d8 (1st level), 3d8 (2nd level), 4d8 (3rd level). She deals an extra 1d8 radiant damage against spellcasters.

trait.name: Lay on Hands (50 HP/Day)
entries: Ser Sydwen can restore up to 50 hit points per day as an action.

trait.name: Spellcasting
entries: Ser Sydwen is a 10th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks).
She has the following spell slots:
1st level (4 slots), 2nd level (3 slots), 3rd level (2 slots).
Prepared Spells:
1st level: Command, Shield of Faith, Compelled Duel, Protection from Evil and Good.
2nd level: Lesser Restoration, Branding Smite, Magic Weapon, Zone of Truth.
3rd level: Dispel Magic, Blinding Smite, Aura of Vitality.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ser Sydwen makes two attacks with her Greatsword of Purification.

action.name: Greatsword of Purification
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.
Hit: 2d6 + 5 slashing damage plus 1d6 radiant damage.

action.name: Channel Divinity (1/Short Rest)
entries: Sacred Weapon: For 1 minute, Ser Sydwen adds +4 to attack rolls with her weapon.
Turn the Arcane (Homebrew): Spellcasters must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute (repeat the save at the end of each of their turns).
